title: I entered an address twice, and I can't find a way to delete the duplicate address.
creator: walsch.nw
content:
Hallo. Ich habe die aktuelle Version von Thunderbird auf meinem Tablet installiert und bei der Eingabe meiner E-Mail Konten, eine Adresse 2 x eingegeben. Ich finde keine Möglichkeit die doppelte Adresse zu löschen. Wie muss ich vorgehen. Entschuldigen Sie das ich in deutsch schreibe, aber mein Englisch ist zu schlecht.

In der Hoffnung auf Hilfe, mit freundlichen grüßen,

Walter Schäffer.

Translation ...

Hello. I have the latest version of Thunderbird installed on my tablet and, when entering my email accounts, I entered an address twice. I can't find a way to delete the duplicate address. What should I do? Sorry for writing in German, but my English is too poor.

Hoping for some help, Sincerely,

Walter Schäffer.

title: Address book
creator: spring_green
content: Can I import my address book from Thunderbird Desktop version to Android version. If no, how about in the future? Will it be possible in your plans?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:136.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/136.0

title: I would like to delete an email on my phone without it deleting it on my desktop
creator: tseabrook
content: I recently switch from the Samsung email to the Thunderbird on my phone and I love the app. However, I would like to figure out how I can delete an email on my phone without it deleting it on my desktop version of Thunderbird (IMAP) or on the server that is offsite. I'm sure there is a setting somewhere but I can't find it.
metadata: ;os:Windows 10 Pro;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
